link_desc:
Provides monitoring statistics from DB2 database snapshots. Includes:

  • Perl script for obtaining statistics
  • UserParameters configuration for useful statistics
  • Template for creating items for the statistics

Documentation: https://github.com/digiapulssi/zabbix-monitoring-scripts/blob/master/documentation/db2stat.md

Tested on Zabbix 3.2. Script and parameters should work on earlier versions, template requires Zabbix 3.2.
author: Sami Pajunen
